title: Secret Folk (4U34)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Dunland
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving a [Dunland] Man, you may place a [Dunland] token on this card. Maneuver: Discard a Free Peoples possession for each [Dunland] token here (limit 3). Discard this condition.
Rarity:	U
